entry.title: My Course Evaluations
entry.content:
I am in a workshop intended to try to improve our teaching in our department.

Students participating mention that it would be valuable to have our student evaluations posted. I have been thinking about doing it for some time… so here they are:

My course evaluations, by my students.

2012

  • SENG 410 Media Applications, Spring

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Summer

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Fall

  • CSC485-A01-586-A01-SENG480 Intellectual Property and Software Engineering, Fall

2011

  • CSC 595 Research Methods in Computer Science, Fall

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Fall

2010

  • CSC589 Mining Software Repositories, Spring

  • CSC499 Honours, Spring

  • SENG 401 Computer and Society, Summer

  • SENG 265 Introduction to Software Engineering Summer

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Fall

2008

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Summer

  • SENG 401 Computer and Society, Summer

  • SENG 410 Media Applications, Spring

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Summer

2007

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Spring

  • CSC484A-ENGL503 Digital Humanities, Summer

2005

  • CSC 586E Open Source Software Engineering, Summer

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Summer

  • SENG 400 Computer and Society, Summer

2004

  • CS483A-SEng480B, Fall

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Fall

2003

  • CSC483a-583b Fall

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Summer

2002

  • CSC 370 Database Systems, Fall

  • SEng480B-CSC586B, Summer

  • SENG 265 Introduction to Software Engineering, Fall

2001

  • SENG 265 Introduction to Software Engineering, Fall

–dmg
